content: **english about the design** *this design is a gift and why make a gift the first answer is why not but i have another reason although i learned to knit when i was a child since i discovered and entered to the contemporary world of knitting i have benefited multiple times from free content tutorials guides videos etc which have taught me endless techniques that i didn t know and have become an infinite source of knowledge for me although i have also benefited from paid material that i value very much and that is worth every penny this gift is a humble return to those who have given me knowledge and entertainment without asking for anything in return about the design itself it is inspired by talking heads band songs which i have always found fun fast-paced different and original i knitted and designed this sweater listening that songs and for the same reason i decided to give it that name i hope you like this small contribution to the world of knitting and that you feel free to make it yours by playing with colors textures etc i really enjoyed designing it and i hope you enjoy knitting it the sweater is knitted from the bottom up in parts back and forth that are then sewn up to the armhole the shoulders are joined using the kitchener stitch technique then the stitches around the armoholes are picked-up to knit the sleeves in the round and top down the collar stitches are also picked up to be worked in the round details such as the under-cuffs and under-collar ribbing are also made by picking up stitches from the inside of the garment and the upper sleeve ribbing uses the same techniques * **details** **sizes** 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 equivalent to 115 120 125 135 145 155 170 185 200 cm of chest circumference finished measurements with 30 -
